thread.title: Intex Aqua Strong 5.1+ with 5-inch display and VoLTE launched for Rs 5,490
thread.title_full: Intex Aqua Strong 5.1+ with 5-inch display and VoLTE launched for Rs 5,490

title: Intex Aqua Strong 5.1+ with 5-inch display and VoLTE launched for Rs 5,490
text:
Intex Aqua Strong 5.1+ with 5-inch display and VoLTE launched for Rs... Intex Aqua Strong 5.1+ with 5-inch display and VoLTE launched for Rs 5,490 By March 3, 2017 “The Aqua Strong 5.1+ is a budget VoLTE-enabled offering with a 2,000mAh battery” 
Intex has added a new entry-level smartphone to its portfolio with the launch of the Aqua Strong 5.1+. The phone comes as a successor to the Aqua Strong 5.1 , which was launched last year. Similar to its predecessor, the Aqua Strong 5.1+ is also a budget 4G and VoLTE-enabled smartphone. The device boots Android 6.0 Marshmallow, and comes integrated with smart tracking feature that lets you track your phone if it’s stolen or lost. 
The Intex Aqua Strong 5.1+ offers a 5-inch display bearing a resolution of 480 x 854 pixels. The phone is powered by a 1.3GHz quad-core Spreadtrum processor, mated to 1GB of RAM. The storage on board is 8GB, which can be further increased by inserting a microSD card. The phone offers a 5MP rear snapper, a 2MP selfie shooter and a 2,000mAh battery. 
The Intex Aqua Strong 5.1+ has been priced at Rs 5,490, and will be available via major brick-and-mortar retail stores in black and gold hues. Facebook Comments
